statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ -2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ 3 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ -8 \\ 10 \\ -9 \\ -12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ 10 \\ -15 \\ 10 \\ 15 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -2 \\ 1 \\ 3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
